name: Sacrificium Optivus
description:
“The outside world is a dangerous and bad place. But in here, in this house, we’re safe.” 

That’s what my mom told us when she sat me and my little sister down.

Find out what will happen next in this Game, Sacrificium Optivus!

-------------------------------------------------------------

Play around with the main menu for surprises!

-------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY

WASD - Movement

Space - Progress Dialogue

-------------------------------------------------------------

MEET THE DEVELOPERS! (PARTY 12)

Visual Artists: Rani, Faiz, Tobi

Programmers: Fakih, Haidar

Game Designer: Chris, Zaydan

Writer: Zaki

Voice Actress: Rani

-------------------------------------------------------------

*This game is a demo and an unfinished project that is still in development
